apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays two men embracing, with one displaying a medium skin tone and the other a default skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart that emanates from the center. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading brings a polished, tactile feel to their figures, highlighting soft rounded edges and a gentle posture of affection. The realistic lighting accentuates the warmth of their connection, making it a powerful symbol of love and partnership in digital conversations.
